rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 3 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:00 PM, 19 June 2025(Thursday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Batangas, Cavite, Bulacan, Rizal and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Palauig, Iba), Laguna(Calauan, Alaminos), Quezon(Tayabas), Pampanga(Santa Rita, Guagua, Bacolor), Tarlac(San Jose, Gerona, Ramos, Anao) and Nueva Ecija(Nampicuan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
